content.detailedDescription:
Pracowalem na polu z byd£em
niespokojne byd£o.
co u licha sie dzieje to nie jest samolot jakie znam.
bez dzwieku i powiewu wiatru.
strach i ciekawosc
polecial nad las i znikno£ 
mam teraz ponad 60 lat i do tej pory nikomu o tym nie mowilem.
content.summary: Dysk z swiatlami dooko£a

content.detailedDescription: This morning i was walking in my neighborhood at 6:30am, it was dark out. i looked up at the moon and saw what i thought was a huge, very bright star, on the left side of the moon, looked back down, kept walking. when i looked back up, i noticed the light was higher than the moon, so i kept watching it. it was moving east very slowly, i thought 'maybe it's a plane?' but i noticed there was no sound, i stopped and i kept watching it until it disappeared behind the clouds.
content.summary: Large, very bright orange-yellow light moving slowly ona straight line.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i have a place in the austin texas that we stay at when visiting the states. it's a rural horse property. we're americans and we had just finished packing for our trip back to zürich switzerland, where we live and work. it was around 1:15am.  i wasn't tired so i thought i'd enjoy one last night (officially morning) on our porch which has a nice view of the sky. i sat there making a mental inventory of my trip ahead when i notice what appeared to be a flickering star. there was some light cloud cover but the flickering appeared to be independent of passing clouds. i assumed it was an inbound plane and since the austin's airport would be closed at that hour, i thought it must be military. however, the lights didn't get any closer or further away and upon closer evaluation with the naked eye, i could see a distinct pattern of blinking lights. about fifteen minutes had passed and being curious, i went inside to get my binoculars. my wife was still up so i asked her to join me outside for a look. we both went outside and to our astonishment, we could see three lights rotating in sequence. the lights were mostly white in color with modest blue, red and green hues. it levitated there for about 30 more minutes, moving only slightly - but passing clouds made its actual movement hard to discern. we are both well educated and i have some aviation and drone experience and yet i can not identify the origin of this light source.
content.summary: Hovering lights - three distinct lights in rotation around a center pivot point.

content.detailedDescription: On 9/9/2014 at 9:08pm my mom and i were in our barn feeding the horses for the night. i was out back closing gates when i heard a rumbling. like what you hear when a jet is flying over. iv heard that a hundred times. there was a full moon rising in the east about 3 or 4 fingers above the horizon and a very clear night. i looked up to the west to where i heard the plane and saw red lights moving se. but it was strange. it had 5 lights in a boomerang pattern. one on the nose and two more on each side. if it was a plane it was the biggest plane iv ever seen. it was really high up too. but iv seen airliners around that same height and it was 5 times bigger than those. there were two jet fighters tailing slightly behind the tips of its wings. i knew they were separate aircraft because they moved independently from the red lights which stayed together and they were not red but more like white/ yellow in color. as the object and jets passed over i could see the jets had blinking aircraft lights. like you see on all aircraft. i kept watching for a few more minutes until the lights faded(by the glare of the moon) to the se. i went back to the barn and told my mother what i had seen. a few minutes after that at 920pm i saw 2 jet fighters returning from the same direction going nw. they were no longer escorting anything and had their afterburners on. they were going much faster than when i had previously seen them.
content.summary: Gigantic black boomerang escorted by two jet fighters.

content.detailedDescription:
I have recently posted a craigslist item for sale. i was meeting him at a local tv station on the east side of springfield, mo. i missed the turn so i turned the car around and noticed a bright, star-like object to the west as i was parking. i had my wife was with me and i told her i was hopeful that the light would stay lit-i thought it may have been a star or planet since it was getting dark. at first my wife was sarcastic and stated that it was the sun setting, then i pointed at the light. she then saw what i meant. 

as i was getting my phone out to take a picture of it, it started to disappear. that's when i became confused since whenever you start to see stars beginning to shine they obviously don't fade, this light did! it really had me confused since i do watch the skies for ufos whenever i get the chance. i took a single picture as it was fading. i had then started to notice another object begin to illuminate in the same area i had just taken the picture. as i watched it, it began to get brighter! my wife even agreed that it was slowly becoming brighter. 

i decided to start filming with the camera on my phone. once again the object got to a bright point then faded slowly. it never moved, only hovered. there was a commercial airliner flying over about this time. i started to watch the plane and noticed a grey orb move very quickly and close to the jet. i tried to point it out to my wife but she didn't see it. it seemed to flutter around the jet for about 10-15 seconds and then i lost sight of it. 

i pointed my camera back in the direction of the first lights had been. i had seen 2 lights illuminate about the same time and throughout the sighting they seemed to move left (south). that's when i saw the final light lit up a brighter red color than the other lights were. i hung out for a couple more minutes to see if i was going to see anything else, but nothing else happened. 

like i said, they never moved like a satellite or the space stations, just hovered and faded more and less brighter. i was very happy and excited about the entire experience and have seen orbs before but nothing like this. i hope the videos and pic show it in better detail. i can definitely send you the original memory card so you can possible get a better look at it with better editing equipment. i am including the pic and 2 videos i took.
content.summary: Saw 4-5 bright lit. star like objects in addition to a grey orb that circled a plane

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in our house looking up out of our window when i noticed a bright reddish-orange light in the constellation pegasus moving slowly toward the north. i ran out onto our deck and observed it for a short while to see if it was an aircraft going overhead. the light was unblinking and moving with no sound when it suddenly stopped moving when nearly straight up. being an amateur astronomer i was intrigued and stumped as to what it might be knowing satellites do not stop i went into the house and grabbed my digital camera hoping to get a video of it. when i came back outside it started moving at a right angle toward the east and just winked out before i could get the camera set for a video shot. it was not an airplane and certainly not a satellite as they do not make right angle turns. it seemed to be very high up maybe a few miles. i have seen another object just like this - same color and appearance some years previous to this one only it was visible in daylight and stayed stationary for about half an hour before disappearing from view all of a sudden. it was not a star or planet as i am very familiar with them as an amateur astronomer.
content.summary: A bright of red-orange color in pegasus moving slowly

content.detailedDescription: I am an amateur astronomer and was out with my telescopes taking pictures of hale bopp in our back yard. i was fiddling with my camera at one point when i happened to look off to the southwest and noticed a strange object with 3 lights of white color in a triangular shaped pattern that never varied from each other distance-wise throughout the observation of about 8 minutes. it was moving slowly toward the northeast above pioneer peak in the chugach mountains just south of our house. it was going in a straight line at a very slow rate of speed without any sound. i ran into the house to get my wife to witness what i was seeing and she came out on the deck observing exactly what i am describing here. we watched it for a spell and then i decided to turn my 12.5 inch reflector on it to see if i could make out any details and verify it was solid and blocking out stars as it passed through them. it was deep twilight and not totally dark although hale-bopp was visible in the western sky at that time. just as i was turning the telescope on it the object winked out. in all the years of being out photographing stars and galaxies i have never seen anything like this including satellites. i was upon first seeing it immediately aware that it was something out of the ordinary. as an amateur astronomer i know the sky well. if only i had been able to get the scope on it before it disappeared i could have verified if it was a solid object for certain. this sighting was interesting because it happened on the same night as the lights over phoenix sighting with a similar object. i did not learn of the lights over phoenix until the next day(morning) when it was on the news and found the similarity more than just a coincidence. i would guess the object(s) was/were at least 5 miles away and would have been rather large in dimensions as it subtended an angle of about 30 arc seconds - the size of the full moon.
content.summary: Triangular shaped light pattern

content.detailedDescription: I was not at the location the time that it happened. we set a deer camera up a few weeks ago and we went and checked it today (9-9-14). and noticed a snake like thing in on of the motion activated pictures. i don't know if it was moving or not because it was just a picture off the camera. my first reaction was a flying snake but i google it and found these things called flying rods that look exactly the same is the one i saw.

I was in surprise, az taking photographs in front of my house of a monsoon storm that was coming through.  the low cloud cover was spectacular with lightening.  i didn't have time to get my tripod, so i ran out to the front of the house with my nikon d7000 digital slr camera and began taking photos about every 2 seconds to try to capture lightening.  i took aprox 12 photos from the front of the house continuously.  i did not notice anything in my frame as i was taking the photos.  in fact i wasn't even looking in that direction.  the lightening was to the left or west of the object.  i noticed the object after i downloaded the photos.  i noticed a dark spot in one of the frames.  aprox 5 minutes earlier, 2 air force fighter jets had passed over and i had captured them on my camera perfectly in focus.  this object looked blurry.  my camera is pretty good with a nikon vr lens which allows me to capture almost anything with no blurriness.  i used a digital zoom on my computer to zoom in on the object that seemed less than a mile away right under the cloud cover.  it was only in 1 frame in a series of photos that i took aprox every 2 seconds.  it is out of focus and appeared to be spinning looking at the photographed i used the digital zoom on.
content.summary: I was photographing a monsoon storm taking photos every 2 seconds for lightening and the object appeared in 1 frame noticed after download.

content.detailedDescription:
Hi,

my girlfriend and i were having dinner outside at a restaurant on the hudson river in piermont ny.My girlfriend noticed objects behind me and we observed three glowing objects in sky traveling slowly from north to south hugging the hudson river shore line.Objects appeared to be traveling in formation.All objects had  tremendous orange glow to them.At first we thought they might be balloons because of the glow that made the objects look a bit tall. as they approached closer to us we noticed other patrons including couple next to me taking video or pictures.We also realized they were not balloons. i snapped a picture as object were above us and slightly inland. at this point all three objects began to head west in a similar pattern as before, however one object on the right sped up at an incredible speed and left the other two behind. all three objects eventually disappeared out of range in a westerly direction with the faster object leaving our range of sight first.
we were absolutely amazed by what we saw. it was very clear early on we were seeing real ufo's. hope this aids all who have witnessed similar and are investigating.

[item moved/cms/nd]
content.summary: Having dinner at restaurant on hudson river, noticed three objects in sky glowing orange heading south and turning west

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i went to the zoo on september 1, 2014. i gave my phone to a person at the zoo to take our picture. a few days later, i was going through the pictures from the zoo and i noticed the object. at first glance i thought it was a blimp. once i magnified the object i was unable to identify it. it appears to be a pentagon turned on its side with a reflective glow around it. it's shadow on the bottom is very dark. my girlfriend wanted to remain anonymous so i cropped her out of the image.
content.summary: I gave my phone to someone to take a picture of my girlfriend and i. the object is seen in the image in the sky above us.

content.detailedDescription: Was web surfing yellowstone national park, which i do on a regular basis all year long. i was in my home office just going through their various web cameras just after 8am in mid to late april. this actually occurred on april 23, 2011 at 8:28 am on the mt. washburn webcam, which is at an elevation around 10,100' give or take a few feet. i was really surprised to see this object on the mountain ridge, and you can see it clearly in the webphoto that i captured at the time. this object was there for a frame or two, then was gone. i have no idea what it was. one thing i am sure of and that is it was not there in june when i hiked the mt. washburn trail to the ranger fire lookout tower. i thought this was out of place, and being a meteorologist, at first i thought it was something for observing snowfall/rainfall. but in my 38 years in meteorology, i have never encountered any equipment that looks like this. you can see the object below the fence on the ridge peak. to this day i am still baffled as to what it could be. you can clearly see it is cylindrical in shape, with what appears to be a silver or grey dome shaped top. this object appeared stationary during the few short webframes. this is the only capture i got of it, before realizing that this was definitely out of place. i have no idea what it was, other than what you can see in the photo. i believe ynp archives there webcam photos, so maybe they have more photos of this.
content.summary: Saw this object on the top of mt. washburn, ynp webcam elv 10,100

content.detailedDescription: Watching fire works over the lake! looking in that direction! did not know, still don't!                                 orange orb rose from the lake (south) and proceeded north out of site! this was on the 3rd of july! on july 4th two orange orbs repeated the same as night before!
content.summary: I seen it take from lake direction lake tillery

content.detailedDescription: Snowmobiling in field lights show-up fallow us in field over to school field back & forth we were young and ride snow mobile around watching for light from parents snowmobile so we could go home quickly this just showed up over had and fallowed us than at school field lights went out
content.summary: Snowmobiling near home just shown-up

content.detailedDescription: Right after hurricane ike my daughter and i were coming back from checking on some friends .We were driving home at around 11 at night we had no power in town and there was a curfew in place so i wanted to get home in time anyway my dahghter saw something in the air comeing from our left and said daddy what is that i could see in the corner of my eye red lights and said its just an airplane and she said no it isn't,about that time i was exeiting the hwy i had to take a left at the stop sign to go to my house.When i stoped i looked up and it stoped right in front of us about 2 or300ft in the air and just hoverd there;iwas trying to figure out what it was iknow it wasn't a helicopter it didn't make a sound it wasn't a blimp and it wasn't a plane we just stared at it i guess about 5 minutes then it tilted at about45 degree angle toward us then i could see it was a disk with red lights all around it i coudnt belive what i was seeing i watched in disbelief for another 5 minutes or so and it just sat there still at that angle then i started to get a little freaked out and thought it was time to get out of there .So i took a left and went on home i got my daughter to watch it as long as she could see it and it was still hovering in the same position.I didn't sleep that night i know what i saw and told a few people but it seems like nobody wants to belive you so i didn't talk about it anymore but it bugs me and that's why im doing this
content.summary: My daughter and i saw a flying sauser about 2 or 300ft from us when we were comjng back from evacuating from hurricane ike

content.detailedDescription:
I thought i should relate this to your organization, as i am now 65, and this event should be recorded before i die.  in 1955-56, my family lived on hamilton avenue in wilmington, nc .  i was 5 and 6 years old at this time.  one night, as a special treat, i was allowed to sleep on a "fainting couch" (chaise lounge) in our back room where we had our piano.  

the room was off the kitchen and had a brick fireplace, and one of the windows was to the left of the fireplace.  the chaise sat slightly to the left of this window.  the window was tall, as this was an old house.  the chimney created an alcove of sorts outside this window.

i was happily snuggled in with pillow and blanket, when a small flying object appeared at the window.  it was perhaps 25" - 30" across.  it was what they call a classic saucer shape, although i didn't know that then.  it had a structure atop the main body of the object, and a 4" - 6" band around the perimeter of the main body.  this band was rotating clockwise, and had round lights about the size of car headlights.  i remember white for sure as being one of the lights' colors, and i think also yellow, but am less sure about that.  but there was other colors than white.

the dead leaves that i knew to be outside the window were being pulled up in a funnel shaped mass that also rotated clockwise.  i could not see the bottom of this object as it was canted in toward the window.  i was terrified, and had the distinct impression i was being watched.  i don't know how long i observed it before doing the typical kid thing, and pulled my covers over my head.  when i peeked out af  short time later, it was gone.

i never tell this to anyone, except both my husbands, and i think they think i'm crazy.  just this past year, i finally told my daughter, who is 43 years old.  her immediate reaction was, "so that's why they were there!"  

when i asked her what she was talking about, she told me that when we lived on felicita avenue in spring valley, ca (ca. 1978 - 1979), she saw the exact same object hovering outside her bedroom window.  she would have been about 7 or 8 years old.
content.summary: Observed small disc hovering outside window

content.detailedDescription: Taking a picture of the bright moon, and zooming in, the object is hovering in front of the moon with a dome-like bottom reflecting the moon's light. the "dark" side of the craft was shadowed and/or it could be argued that it was cemetrical as well.
content.summary: Cone-shaped with dome-like bottom

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were duck hunting in the flynn's lick community in jackson county, tn.  we arrived at our duck blind at approx. 5 a.M.  while waiting for the sun to come we observed a small white light moving slowly above the tree line on top of a ridge off in the distance.  the object before vanishing.  it later appeared off to the right of us about 30 seconds later.  it once again flew slowly above the tree tops before vanishing once again.  the object continued to do this for about 5 minutes in all.  this even frightened us both and we nearly left.  

a few weeks later we brought 2 more friends duck hunting with us.  we told them about our previous experience at the same duck blind, which they thought was all a joke.  we once again arrived at the blind at approx. 5 a.M.  the light once again appeared and began performing similar tactics as the last encounter.  our friends were shocked and, needless to say, no longer thought it was all a joke.  

these events occurred in 2012.  i had just finished my first semester of college.  i believe the reason i am hesitant to discuss these events is because i am afraid of the social stigma that comes with such a claim.
content.summary: Duck hunting with friend.  witnessed a light fly slowly above tree line.  would disappear and reappear in random places along horizon.

content.detailedDescription: During thunderstorm saw this object approaching at low altitude over hwy in downtown area,i was driving east and it was coming toward me. it was a very large triangle and the lights on the outside seemed like they changed from green to white. there were no red lights at all on this craft. then very slowly and silently hovered for a moment over a building near an intersection where i caught a red light. i nearly hit a parked car trying to observe it and cars coming at me seemed like they were veering to look it also. then it changed direction to move sw and even though it was storming out i tried to listen for sound by rolling down my car window and heard nothing. it moved slowly at first and then like a shot it was gone.
content.summary: Hovering over highway

content.detailedDescription:
At 5:28a the morning of tuesday, september 9th, 2014 i was leaving my house to go to work and noticed a bright blue light pulsating about 30 degrees east of the north star.  at first i thought it was a plane but by the time i got to my car and looked back at it, i saw it hadn't moved from it's position.  knowing that planes don't hover, and this thing was way too high up to be a helicopter, i put on my distance-driving glasses to get a better look and saw a hovering blue light that was pulsating very rapidly.  
i quickly pulled out my smartphone and took a picture of it.  as i was viewing the zoomed-in object through my phone lens to snap a shot, i saw it zigzagging like crazy within a small area.  i then turned my phone camera on and filmed it for about 15 seconds.  i unzoomed the camera shot to give viewers an idea as to how far away it was, and then by the time i zoomed back in the object was quickly fading from sight and then was gone completely.  i have never seen anything like this. pretty exciting, if i may say so.
content.summary: Blinking blue star-like light that zigzagged in a small area very quickly and then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: 9pm i walked outside of my apartment building, my neighbor was sitting out there with a friend, she told me to look up, when i did i saw round flame like object.At first we thought something like a plane was on fire, but it wasn't burning.No smoke.No noise(i would assume a burning plane would make some noise) also, it was not falling.It was moving across the sky pretty slowly.It looked like a burning red-orange ball of fire.This last about 4 minutes.As it moved over our apartment building, my neighbor and i ran through to the other side(3 seconds), we looked and saw it moving up and further away,within a matter 5 seconds it was so far away that anyone who didn't follow it would have thought`bright star`.A few minutes later we noticed to more objects to its right,we thought were stars, but we're changing shape into boomerangs.About twenty minutes later we saw a black helicopter move toward the initial"fireball"and pass by it.Then circled about ten minutes later and passed in front of it again.As we are watching, we saw the objects change from, green, to blue, to red, dim out and get very bright again,it continued to that the entire time.The "fireball"was next to a star, so we used that as a vantage point.And would see the initial"fireball"move up and several minutes later back down again it did this a few times.@10:00pm i and my neighbor and her daughter went inside,i put my little girl to bed, went back outside 15 minutes later.And all three objects were gone, completely cleared out! all that was left was that one star we were using as a vantage point.I called wdrb,wlky,whas news and asked if anyone reported anything,i told them what i saw they said nothing was reported and they were not expecting anything in our skies to be seen with the naked eye.Wdrb actually told me it was the"super moon"lol thought that was funny! obviously i know the difference.I wish i would have been able to take a photo or video but i have a very old cell phone, and my neighbor's phone wasn't working right at the time.Any input would be greatly appreciated!I have never seen anything like this and scared me a bit. thank you....Jill
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Fireball first hovering e then flaoting then shooting out towards sw and hovered another hour

content.detailedDescription:
I already filed a report with mufon but did not think of very important before and after details and so here is more of what happened to me.. i was 2 miles from home and trying to sleep when i just could not! i heard this low frequency pulsating sound that sounded like haarp or something? she said you just keep tossing and turning  why don't you go home and see you in the morning. i said ok it was then about 12 am. i was nearing the driveway there was super huge lights casting on in the sky about 2x treetop level i looked and seen 3 lights up in a row  but then as i turned in i realized it leveled out and was now a huge triangle with super bright led direct current type lights on each corner. it was too late for me because i had already turned into the driveway did not really know what was going on and at that point i decided to backup floor it and get outta there fast. so i did but then panicked because i thought wait a min. they could possibly abduct or disable vehicle. i had 2 seconds to make decision i dropped the shifter into drive and did 50 towards getting inside. i did not know what to do so i ran into the room where i have tv hooked up to a outdoor camera system installed due to past outdoor theft. not for anything else anyway i for some reason was  very afraid huddled in a corner near the tv waiting to see if the any of the cameras motion sensors went full screen my primary focus was on the side opposite me where the thing was; my main concern were 2 bedroom windows where the craft was now hovering tree top and also the easiest point of entry. the camera sensor went full screen to just what i did not want the 2nd and easiest window/entry point; here a neon green grasshopper had somehow jumped right onto that 3 inch lens maybe it was attracted to the red led lights? and just jumped up there but maybe more? i watched this thing in hd and admired how it had 2 arms 2 legs was kinda built like a human and had a more triangular face with solid black almond shaped eyes as i was watching this the camera went out! i almost pooped! then i heard a fighter jet and seen the lights of the ship pass across the back tree top silent jet close behind. there is more that i would like to say because they did return 3 times but i am afraid to talk the dvr hard drive was destroyed and replaced due to the black heli 20ft from me i did not ask for this. i want nothing with any of whatever.
thanks
content.summary: The huge triangle is real it is not from here the people have a right to know

content.detailedDescription:
on the morning of august 29 2014, i went out my sliding glass door to let me dog go to the bathroom. while i was standing there watching her do her business i looked towards the ne-e sky in between trees that are visible in my yard and say what i though at first was some kind of drone or someone playing with a remote control aircraft. but the more i thought about it, the more i realized that its way to early on a work day for someone to be playing with a toy. so i used my cell phone to take three pics as it moved from se into tree cover. the object was diamond shape but concave towards the bottom.
the back almost look like something out of a move like it would have engines off the back only it wasn't moving in the direction the engines were facing.I was able to see this object for about a full min and a half to notice it had what looked to me like a glass area in the front side for observation.
 there was no sound however where i live is a very high commercial airline traffic are. i would be hard pressed to believe this would not have shown up on radar.
 i was so in awe that when i got to work i uploaded the pictures to my computer at work stared at them and began to draw them as to what i would think the would look like from multiple angles to determine if what i saw was man made.
content.summary: Went out to let dog pee in yard and looked into the ne direction and saw a diamond shape however it had structure to it and almost like a boat shape...Diamond but concave towards that bottom

content.detailedDescription:
It was in the late springtime in 1995 i was returning home from a local car show.As i was exiting my car in my driveway i noticed a funnel cloud crossing the field next to our home. there was a lot of popup bad thunderstorms with tornado's ,kind of a outbreak that day.Well i already had camera in hand exiting my car when i decided to just use up the rest of the roll of film from the car show we had been at that day when i started taking pictures of the funnel cloud that did spawn a tornado touchdown just few miles up the rode.
 never saw the objects that i photographed until i got the film back from being developed quite some time later like 6 months to year later.It wasn't until my wife and my sister where going through the rolls of film that she had just gotten developed that we noticed there was something on one of the photos. my sister came to me and asked me what i was trying to photograph in this picture when i told her it was a funnel cloud becoming a tornado that eventually dropped down a few miles away, when she said no not that, the objects in the sky? that is when we discovered i had caught something on film following the storm. didn't know what it was then and the photo still makes people scratch their head when they look at it today.So if someone can shed light on this photo that would be great because its been a mystery to me for almost 20 years.
content.summary: Objects in the sky following thunderstorm

content.detailedDescription: Walking my dog last saturday night (sept 6th) it was about to storm and there was lighting in the sky i was looking at that's when i noticed this bright object hovering in the distance i stopped and observed it for a few seconds before it started moving very strangely and stopping in mid air that's when i pulled out my phone and started recording for about a minute and a half then it changed directions and dissapeared behind a tree. at first i thought it could of been a helicopter cause it flashed red a couple times but not the way an aircraft should. my feelings were that this could be authentic and i should put it in the hands of the right people.
content.summary: Walking late at night witnessed something strange in the sky took a short clip before it vanished

content.detailedDescription: Between 525 and 5:35 am on sept. 8th i witnessed a large triangle (three brighter than surrounding stars) hovering at what appeared to be a great distance in the south east portion of the sky at between 75 and 80 degrees off the horizon. i just wanted to submit this in case someone else in our area might have seen the same thing. for confirmation purposes only, no contact necessary. thank you.
content.summary: Viewed light formation through windshield

content.detailedDescription:
Monday september 8th at approx. 10pm,
my mom and me went outside in our garden and we immediately saw a strange pulsating light, flying fast, ne in the sky.
the object was shaped like a grey triangle and the light was on the back side of this object.

after a few seconds there appeared another white (a little bit smaller but also very bright) pulsating light a few meters next to it.
they flew for a few seconds next to eachother and then the smaller light disappeared for a while.


my mom went inside to get the camera and when she came back the smaller light appeared about 100m from the other object,
they both flew in a straight line, right into the pad of an airplane.

when this airplane was very close to the objects,
the smaller light changed quickly of direction and then dissappeared.

the bigger light also turned off, but we could still see the grey/white triangle shaped object.
when the airplane was behind  it the pulsating light was turned on again and it continued flying east.


we could still follow the object for a few minutes, 
and the weirdest thing about this is that the light never lost its brightness,
even if it was a few miles further then we 1st saw it....


unfortunately you can't see the shape on the photo's we made....

we think it flew at the same altitude as the plane and the speed was faster then a normal airplane, there was no engine sound...

we often look at the sky and we know it was not something like a fire balloon or satelite (it was to big)...
content.summary: Strange flying objects

content.detailedDescription: I looked off in the distance as i was drivieng home and right above the tree line i see a flash of light white to yellow light that instantly dissapears my whole body starts tingleing  me and my friend who was in the passangers seat both saw the lightand started getting a tingleing feeling throughout our bodys it also made us tear up a bit
content.summary: I looked off in the distance as i was drivieng home & right above the tree line i see a flash of light white to yellow light that instantly dissapears my whole body starts tingleing  me and my friend who was in the passangers seat both saw the light

content.detailedDescription:
Between the years 1979-81, approx 8:30-10:00pm (fully dark out) warmer months, summer. i was between the ages of 8-10 yrs old, may have been younger. i was standing at my back door calling for my cat to come in as i did every night. suddenly i noticed a large black disk the size of a stop sign at arms length approx the height of a tall radio tower floatng slowly from the left rear of my yard. it may have made noise, if it did, it was not loud. it moved over my house diagnolly to leave the front right side (facing home). i ran from my back door to the front door outside holding the hand rail as i looked up at this massive disc. i was young, i did not know about ufos. the bottom didn't appear to be smooth, it looked like it had sections that were raised, with sharp edges? not excessively, enough to see a difference. i was awed, amazed. and i watched as it moved slowly across the sky. the sky was clear, because it was dark against the craft. i watched it till i could not see it anymore due to homes or trees. i must have gone in at that point because i was not allowed out front by myself. 

i know what i saw, but i don't know what it was. it has stayed with me all these yrs, clear in my head. i recently was out walking my dog and stopped to look at a radio towers height, and figured what i saw that night was as high or a little higher. and i think it must have been as big or bigger than a stop sign held at arms length.

i want to know if anyone else saw anything? i want to know and understand what it was i saw. i want answers. i would love for people to take me seriously when i talk about my experiences.

i am a college graduate, single mom of two teenagers. i work full time for a local builder. i am a skeptical believer in ufology. i have followed the subject for at least 25 yrs, or longer. i am a current member of mufon.
thank you for your time.
content.summary: Large dark disk, size of stop sign at arms length, no lights. or sound that i remember,  summer.

content.detailedDescription:
daughter(s) were driving home coming in from the se of abilene and heading home from work. both saw the object and tried to take a picture but wouldn't show up on cell phone. be better if you called. this is not the first time my daughter or i have seen these. 
 the object is also drawn... and the light on the object were ( the two white ones on the side ) were like the eyes of a chameleon. moved in odd directions as if looking for something. there is cattle in the area... better that you call or e-mail with someone to talk to. i also have a photo that can not be explained and will not show it here. rather show it in person.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I have a map and placed where and when it happened.
